metadata.title: CVE-2020-4046 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In affected versions of WordPress, users with low privileges (likecontributors and authors) can use the embed block in a certain way toinject unfiltered HTML in the block editor. When affected posts are viewedby a higher privileged user, this could lead to script execution in theeditor/wp-admin. This has been patched in version 5.4.2, along with all thepreviously affected versions via a minor release (5.3.4, 5.2.7, 5.1.6,5.0.10, 4.9.15, 4.8.14, 4.7.18, 4.6.19, 4.5.22, 4.4.23, 4.3.24, 4.2.28,4.1.31, 4.0.31, 3.9.32, 3.8.34, 3.7.34).

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
